item.title: The problem with installing SQL Server Express via the Microsoft Web Platform Installer
item.description: If you use Web Platform Installer to install SQL Server Express, you might be in for a surprise if you try to install AdventureWorks.

item.title: Microsoft Web Platform Installer = the easy button
item.description: Need an easy button? Microsoft's Web Platform Installer is exactly that for Windows-based machines.

item.title: Installing WordPress 2.9.2 on Windows Server 2003 using Microsoft's Web Platform Installer
item.description: Microsoft's Web Platform Installer has become a little better known, but how easy does it really make installations? In this article I use the Web Platform Installer to install WordPress (with MySQL, PHP, and etcetera) on Windows Server 2003.
